references.citationDetail: 2108344: Thermen VII 1, 8 Sog. Stabianer Thermen Pompeii, Pompei
references.formattedCitation: Reinhard Foertsch, ed. Arachne: IDAI Objects. Köln; Berlin: Archaeological Institute, University of Cologne; German Archaeological Institute. Accessed February 5, 2020. https://arachne.uni-koeln.de/.

description: The Stabian Baths (VII, 1, 8) and (VII,2) are located at the intersection of the Via Stabiana and the Via dell'Abbondanza. They are the oldest baths in Pompeii.
